messages.content: who is the greatest player of all time in the NBA?

The greatest player of all time in the NBA is a subjective question and there is no one definitive answer. However, some of the most highly regarded players in the history of the league include Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Michael Jordan, and LeBron James.
how many championships and MVPs did MJ win throughout his storied career?
Michael Jordan won six NBA championships and was named Most Valuable Player (MVP) of the league five times during his career.

awesome! for MJ's 6 championships, and 5 league MVPs... do you know which season where he won the championship but not the MVP? 
likewise, in the seasons where he won the 5 MVP, did he go on to win the championship?
Yes, in the 1992-1993 season, Michael Jordan won the NBA Championship but not the MVP award. In the 1997-1998 season, Michael Jordan won the MVP award but did not win the NBA Championship.
